interface.name: nosetests-plugin-resolver
interface.summary: wrapper around nosetests that resolves plugins from NOSETEST_PLUGINS
interface.description:
This runner runs the python nosetests program, but using a plugin resolver based on entries in the NOSETEST_PLUGINS environment variable.
This feed should not be run directly by users, the intended use is as a <runner> for user-specific zero-install feeds (see http://gfxmonk.net/dist/0install/nosetests-runner.xml).
You can also compose your own set of nosetests plugins by listing them as <requires> elements and using this feed as a runner.
For example:
<group> <command name="run"> <runner interface="http://gfxmonk.net/dist/0install/nosetests-plugin-resolver.xml"/> </command> <requires interface="http://example.com/my-nosetest-plugin"/> <implementation id="." version="0.0.1"/> </group>
This is very useful when using 0test, as you can ensure nosetests gets run with the correct set of plugins available.
